    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton1ActionPerformed
        
         String path="jdbc:mysql://localhost/";
         String place="librarydb";
         int iday,imonth,rday,rmonth;
         
         if(jTextField1.getText().equalsIgnoreCase(""))
         {
             JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Add return ID");
         }
         else{
         try
         {
             Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
             Connection myconnection=DriverManager.getConnection( path+place,"root","");
               
             String query="select * from issuebooktbl where studentid="+ jTextField1.getText();
             PreparedStatement mystatement=myconnection.prepareStatement(query);
             ResultSet myresult=mystatement.executeQuery();
             if(myresult.next())
             {
             String dateissue=myresult.getString("date_issued");
             String[] dates=dateissue.split("-");
             imonth=Integer.parseInt(dates[1]);
             iday=Integer.parseInt(dates[2]);
             String returnday=jComboBox1.getSelectedItem().toString();
             String returnmonth=jComboBox2.getSelectedItem().toString();
             
            
             rday=Integer.parseInt(returnday);
            rmonth=Integer.parseInt(returnmonth);
            
            if(rmonth==imonth)
            {
                if(rday-iday>=14)
                {
                    JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Late return.Pay fine of Rs. 50");
                }
                else
                {
                     String query1="delete  from issuebooktbl where studentid="+ jTextField1.getText();
                    PreparedStatement mystatement1=myconnection.prepareStatement(query1);
                    mystatement1.execute();
                     JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Books returned successfuly");
                    
                }
            }
             if(rmonth!=imonth)
             {
                 JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Late return.Pay fine of Rs. 50");
             }
             }
             else{
                 JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Invalid ID");
             }
              myconnection.close();
         }  
          catch(Exception e)
        {
             JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this,"Error in query" + e.getMessage());
        }
         }
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton1ActionPerformed

    private void formInternalFrameActivated(javax.swing.event.InternalFrameEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_formInternalFrameActivated
        
        for(int x=1; x<=31; x++)
        {
            jComboBox1.addItem(x);
        }
        
        for(int x=1; x<=12; x++)
        {
            jComboBox2.addItem(x);
        }
        
        for(int x=2010; x<=2020; x++)
        {
            jComboBox3.addItem(x);
        }
    }//GEN-LAST:event_formInternalFrameActivated

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jButton2ActionPerformed
        
        jTextField1.setText("");
        jComboBox1.setSelectedIndex(0);
         jComboBox2.setSelectedIndex(0);
         jComboBox3.setSelectedIndex(0);
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jButton2ActionPerformed

    private void jTextField1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_jTextField1ActionPerformed
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }//GEN-LAST:event_jTextField1ActionPerformed
